header.title: Personal Codes
header.subtitle: Practical power numbers for PIN codes, passwords, and important decisions

digitCount.title: Number of digits
digitCount.hint: More digits = more complex energy formula

fourDigits.title: 4 digits
fourDigits.text:
• Bank card PIN to attract money
• Doorbell code for home security
• Time of important meetings (3:37 PM)

sixDigits.title: 6 digits
sixDigits.text:
• Banking app password
• Home WiFi password for family luck
• Important account passwords

sevenPlusDigits.title: 7+ digits
sevenPlusDigits.text:
• Last digits of phone number
• Target salary (code × $1000)
• Lottery ticket number
